clinical_study.brief_title: The Safety and Immunogenicity Research of Live Attenuated Varicella Vaccine After the 2 Doses Vaccination
clinical_study.official_title: Phase 4 Study of Live Attenuated Varicella Vaccine After the 2 Doses Vaccination

lead_sponsor.agency: Beijing Center for Disease Control and Prevention

clinical_study.source: Beijing Center for Disease Control and Prevention

brief_summary.textblock: Through evaluating the immunogenicity and safety for Varicella vaccine two doses immune procedure we could supply scientific and practical evidence for this two doses immune procedure promotion and management.

detailed_description.textblock: Healthy participants aged 1 to 12 years old who had never received Varicella Vaccine are divided into three age groups, 1 to 3 years old group, 4 to 6 years old group and 7-12 years old group. In each age group, participants are randomly divided into experiment group and control groups.

primary_outcome.measure: Antibody titer after 2 doses lived attenuated varicella vaccination
primary_outcome.description: Serums are collected from all participants before and 42 days after the first vaccination, and also 42 days after the second vaccination. The antibody titer to Varicella was detected through FAMA test.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants who have adverse reaction
secondary_outcome.description: The safety is evaluated by systemic and local reaction after each vaccination.

other_outcome.measure: Number of participants who catch chickenpox

arm_group.description: 2 doses varicella vaccine either BCHT or Kengen and 3 month of the interval time
2 doses varicella vaccine either BCHT or Kengen and 6 month of the interval time

intervention.description: Give a single 0.5 mL HBV and get blood samples at 0,1.5,4.5 month
Give a single 0.5 mL HBV and get blood samples at 0,1.5,7.5 month
Give 2 doses varicella vaccine (a single 0.5 mL) and get blood samples at 0,1.5,4.5 month
Give 2 doses varicella vaccine (a single 0.5 mL) and get blood samples at 0,1.5,7.5 month
